nodes.bodyText: I'm not sure if we want a toast here. It'll mean nothing to the end-user. what do you think?

If a button present on screen for showing options menu and navigation menu then, but pressing  on button do nothing, then might be one message should be shown, "Why that button not working?"
One thing may be done, it should be added in manual, how it can be used and implemented.

I'm not sure about including the javascript function name, rather than the name of the feature.
Aside from that, it seems fine. Implementer's choice

I have added different message now.
May be better than earlier.
